31 Ritz cracker, Tenerife
4h15m 20 6
It’s kids’ heaven at the five-star Ritz-Carlton Abama, in Tenerife, and therefore parents’ paradise. It has seven pools and a seriously good kids’ club, with activities ranging from eco challenges, treasure hunts and visits to the coral reef to pizza- and cookie-making workshops. That leaves grown-ups time to enjoy the tropical nuts melting ritual, or perhaps something less eye-watering, in the huge spa, or to play a round of golf. Do make time for a family excursion to the Siam Park water park. Booking by September 30 earns you a 15% discount for February half-term.
From £988pp in a Citadel Junior Suite, arriving on February 14; 01293 731566, sovereign.com
